channel.title: How do i make other skills add to combat level?
channel.description:
I was just wondering because i may make Agility or slayer or some other skill..Just to add a twist to server
Also i posted this on my other topic but no1 answered it so ill ask it here to..
How would i make it so the drops are out of 1000 and not 100... Just like in Haven..... i want this so then i can have items that are actually hard to get in my server..
Any ideas would help.. Thanks

item.title: How do i make other skills add to combat level?
item.dc:creator: @TimeWarp TimeWarp
item.description:
@TimeWarp wrote:

I dont even have a player class file… I have a Player.JAVA though…and i searched thru that …

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make other skills add to combat level?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

`Rich:

What you’re looking for is in the player class, search around for the skills which add up to get your combat level, and it should be pretty easy from there.

I told you exactly where to look, we aren’t going to spoon-feed you.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make other skills add to combat level?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

tonypker13:

You can raise the max lvl, you cant add a certain skill to a cb unless you use a 508 server.

Yes, you can, I did it.

@OP

What you’re looking for is in the player class, search around for the skills which add up to get your combat level, and it should be pretty easy from there.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make other skills add to combat level?
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

[quote=“xstrxpurez, post:7, topic:241402”][quote author=tonypker13 link=topic=317744.msg2520407#msg2520407 date=1225845405]

i showed u how to… and yes u can tony its not hard…

        int l2 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerSlayer]);

In a regular base you can make skills raise combat? I thought you can only raise the max skill lvl…
You cant make a certain skill raise it
[/quote]

yea u can, its only adding int’s such as the 1 i provided… and u can make the max skill lvls rise to but i wouldnt wana do it…

richscape has slayer added to combat s tony please be quiet.

you be quiet.

i showed u how to… and yes u can tony its not hard…

        int l2 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerSlayer]);

You didnt show me how…You showed that one guy how on another post… and i tryed putting that in player.java under Public void GetCombat() and it still didnt work…

put it under the int l1…[/quote]
Hmm I’ll have to try that.

Read full topic
